IOTApplicationInterface - Interface in IOT.IOTApplication
Interface for all application implementations to include handling of incoming Notifications as well as sending them to the Subscribers.
IOTClient - Class in IOT.IOTClient
The IOTClient is mainly responisble for creating and sending messages over the network.
IOTClient(SubscriberList, String) - Constructor for class IOT.IOTClient.IOTClient
Creates a new instance of client.
IOTClientInterface - Interface in IOT.IOTClient
This interface defines the messaging functionality of the client.
IOTMessage - Class in IOT.IOTApplication
Class used to package messages between applications ready to be sent.
IOTMessage(String, String, String) - Constructor for class IOT.IOTApplication.IOTMessage
 
IOTRunner - Class in IOT
This class serves as dependency manager.
IOTRunner() - Constructor for class IOT.IOTRunner
Instantiates all references.
IOTServer - Class in IOT.IOTServer
This class handles logical IOT requests.

IOTServerInterface - Interface in IOT.IOTServer
Created by melaniebalaz on 24/10/2016.
ipAddress - Variable in class IOT.Subscriber
The IP-Address of the node the interested application lies at.
